title: Die Chroniken von Narnia - Prinz Kaspian von Narnia
description: The four Pevensie children return to Narnia, only to discover that hundreds of years have passed since they ruled there, and the evil King Miraz has taken charge. With the help of a heroic mouse called Reepicheep, and the exiled heir to the throne, Prince Caspian, they set out to overthrow the King, once again with Aslan's help. Written by comicfan
castList: [Ben Barnes, Georgie Henley, Skandar Keynes, William Moseley, Anna Popplewell, Sergio Castellitto, Peter Dinklage, Warwick Davis, Vincent Grass, Pierfrancesco Favino, Cornell John, Damián Alcázar, Alicia Borrachero, Simón Andreu, Predrag Bjelac]
characterList: [Prince Caspian, Lucy Pevensie, Edmund Pevensie, Peter Pevensie, Susan Pevensie, Miraz, Trumpkin, Nikabrik, Doctor Cornelius, General Glozelle, Glenstorm (as Cornell S. John), Lord Sopespian (as Damian Alcazar), Prunaprismia, Lord Scythley (as Simon Andreu), Lord Donnon (as Pedja Bjelac)]
